verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> and to Aaron,<WH175> saying,<WH559>

"Speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and tell<WH559> them,<WH376> 'When any man<WH376> has a discharge<WH2100> from his body,<WH1320> because of his discharge<WH2100> he is unclean.<WH2931>

This shall be his uncleanness<WH2932> in his discharge:<WH2101> whether his body<WH1320> runs<WH7325> with his discharge,<WH2101> or his body<WH1320> has stopped<WH2856> from his discharge,<WH2101> it is his uncleanness.<WH2932>
<WH4904>"'Every bed whereon he who has the discharge<WH2100> lies<WH7901> shall be unclean;<WH2930> and everything<WH3627> he sits<WH3427> on shall be unclean.<WH2930>
Whoever<WH376> touches<WH5060> his bed<WH4904> shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and bathe<WH3526> himself in water,<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until the evening.<WH6153>

He who sits<WH3427> on anything<WH3627> whereon the man who has the discharge<WH2100> sat<WH3427> shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and bathe<WH3526> himself in water,<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until the evening.<WH6153>

<WH5060>"'He who touches the body<WH1320> of him who has the discharge<WH2100> shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and bathe<WH3526> himself in water,<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until the evening.<WH6153>

<WH2100>"'If he who has the discharge spits<WH7556> on him who is clean,<WH2889> then he shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and bathe<WH3526> himself in water,<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until the evening.<WH6153>
<WH4817>"'Whatever saddle he who has the discharge<WH2100> rides<WH7392> on shall be unclean.<WH2930>

Whoever touches<WH5060> anything that was under him shall be unclean<WH2930> until the evening.<WH6153> He who carries<WH5375> those things shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and bathe<WH3526> himself in water,<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until the evening.<WH6153>

<WH2100>"'Whoever he who has the discharge touches,<WH5060> without having rinsed<WH7857> his hands<WH3027> in water,<WH4325> he shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and bathe<WH3526> himself in water,<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until the evening.<WH6153>
<WH3627>"'The earthen vessel, which he who has the discharge<WH2100> touches,<WH5060> shall be broken;<WH7665> and every vessel<WH3627> of wood<WH6086> shall be rinsed<WH7857> in water.<WH4325>

<WH2100>"'When he who has a discharge is cleansed<WH2891> of his discharge,<WH2100> then he shall count<WH5608> to himself seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> for his cleansing,<WH2893> and wash<WH3526> his clothes;<WH899> and he shall bathe<WH3526> his flesh<WH1320> in running<WH2416> water,<WH4325> and shall be clean.<WH2891>

<WH8066>"'On the eighth day<WH3117> he shall take<WH3947> two<WH8147> turtledoves,<WH8449> or two<WH8147> young<WH1121> pigeons,<WH3123> and come<WH935> before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> to the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> and give<WH5414> them to the priest:<WH3548>

and the priest<WH3548> shall offer<WH6213> them,<WH259> the one for a sin offering,<WH2403> and the other<WH259> for a burnt offering.<WH5930> The priest<WH3548> shall make atonement<WH3722> for him before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> for his discharge.<WH2101>
<WH376>"'If any man has<WH3318> an emission<WH7902> of semen,<WH2233> then he shall bathe<WH7364> all his flesh<WH1320> in water,<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until the evening.<WH6153>
Every garment,<WH899> and every skin,<WH5785> whereon the<WH7902> semen<WH2233> is,<WH3526> shall be washed with water,<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until the evening.<WH6153>

If a man<WH376> lies<WH7901> with a woman<WH802> and there is an emission<WH7902> of semen,<WH2233> they shall both bathe<WH7364> themselves in water,<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until the evening.<WH6153>

<WH802>"'If a woman has a discharge,<WH2100> and her discharge<WH2100> in her flesh<WH1320> is blood,<WH1818> she shall be in her impurity<WH5079> seven<WH7651> days:<WH3117> and whoever touches<WH5060> her shall be unclean<WH2930> until the evening.<WH6153>
<WH7901>"'Everything that she lies on in her impurity<WH5079> shall be unclean.<WH2930> Everything also that she sits<WH3427> on shall be unclean.<WH2930>
Whoever touches<WH5060> her bed<WH4904> shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and bathe<WH3526> himself in water,<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until the evening.<WH6153>
Whoever touches<WH5060> anything<WH3627> that she sits<WH3427> on shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and bathe<WH3526> himself in water,<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until the evening.<WH6153>
If it is on the bed,<WH4904> or on anything<WH3627> whereon she sits,<WH3427> when he touches<WH5060> it,<WH2930> he shall be unclean until the evening.<WH6153>

<WH376>"'If any man lies<WH7901> with<WH7901> her,<WH5079> and her monthly flow is on him,<WH2930> he shall be unclean seven<WH7651> days;<WH3117> and every bed<WH4904> whereon he lies<WH7901> shall be unclean.<WH2930>

<WH802>"'If a woman has<WH2100> a discharge<WH2101> of her blood<WH1818> many<WH7227> days<WH3117> not<WH3808> in the time<WH6256> of her period,<WH5079> or if she has a discharge<WH2100> beyond the time<WH5921> of her period;<WH5079> all the days<WH3117> of the discharge<WH2101> of her uncleanness<WH2932> shall be as in the days<WH3117> of her period:<WH5079> she is unclean.<WH2931>

Every bed<WH4904> whereon she lies<WH7901> all the days<WH3117> of her discharge<WH2101> shall be to her as the bed<WH4904> of her period:<WH5079> and everything<WH3627> whereon she sits<WH3427> shall be unclean,<WH2931> as the uncleanness<WH2932> of her period.<WH5079>
Whoever touches<WH5060> these things shall be unclean,<WH2930> and shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and bathe<WH3526> himself in water,<WH4325> and be unclean<WH2930> until the evening.<WH6153>
<WH2891>"'But if she is cleansed of her discharge,<WH2101> then she shall count<WH5608> to herself seven<WH7651> days,<WH3117> and after<WH310> that she shall be clean.<WH2891>

On the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> she shall take<WH3947> two<WH8147> turtledoves,<WH8449> or two<WH8147> young<WH1121> pigeons,<WH3123> and bring<WH935> them to the priest,<WH3548> to the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>

The priest<WH3548> shall offer<WH6213> the one<WH259> for a sin offering,<WH2403> and the other<WH259> for a burnt offering;<WH2403> and the priest<WH3548> shall make atonement<WH3722> for her before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> for the uncleanness<WH2932> of her discharge.<WH2101>

<WH5144>"'Thus you shall separate the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from their uncleanness,<WH2932> so they will not die<WH4191> in their uncleanness,<WH2932> when they defile<WH2930> my tabernacle<WH4908> that is in their midst.<WH8432>'"
This is the law<WH8451> of him who has a discharge,<WH2100> and of him who has an emission<WH3318> of semen,<WH2233> so that he is unclean thereby;<WH2930>
and of her who has<WH1739> her period,<WH5079> and of a man<WH2145> or woman<WH5347> who has<WH2100> a discharge,<WH2101> and of him<WH376> who lies<WH7901> with her who is unclean.<WH2931>
